challenges.title: ** Reviewing Professional Source Code
description: Reading professional source code is a great way to learn.
You will be provided with professional source code after you complete each of these projects.
Take time to compare your source code to the professional version to learn what strategies and techniques were used.
Commit to not look at the professional source code until you have completed and submitted your project.

challenges.title: User Management Page with MVC
description: The page must match the design as close as possible.
Technology Stack: 1. Use only HTML, CSS, Javascript, Bootstrap, and Font Awesome.
Remember to use the Research-Ask method if you get stuck.

challenges.title: User Management Page with MVC Source Code Review
description: Confirm that you have that you have completed and submitted the User Management Page with MVC project.

Please review the professional source code and compare it to your own.

Click here to view the professional source code.
Confirm that you have reviewed the professional source code.
